# Frumpy

Welcome to Frumpy. Welcome to the Frump.

<p align="center">
  <img width="400" src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/frumpyfrumpster/frumpy/main/Frumpy.png">
</p>

## Installation

```bash
pip install frumpy
```

## Usage

Use exactly like `numpy` lol

```python
import frumpy
x = frumpy.array((0, 1, 2))
print(x)
>>> [0 1 2]
```
